DOC.brief_summary: Time to perform lung function test after chest physiotherapy in cystic fibrosis. The investigators study FEV1(forced expiratory volume in one second) and FVC (forced vital capacity).
DOC.brief_title: Time to Perform Lung Function Test in Cystic Fibrosis
DOC.detailed_description: The patients perform spirometry before, direct after, 30 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, and 3 hours after physiotherapist. The investigators want to study the FEV1 and FVC.
DOC.criteria: Patients with cystic fibrosis patients with cystic fibrosis who could not stay at the clinic for more than 4 hrs.
